dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 495 EH: Subterranean Border Defense Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To require annual reports on counter illicit cross-border tunnel operations, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Subterranean Border Defense Act.

section.header: Annual reports on counter illicit cross-border tunnel operations
section.text: Paragraph (2) of section 7134(a) of the James M. Inhofe National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2023 (Public Law 117â€“263; 6 U.S.C. 257 note) is amended by inserting and annually thereafter after development of the strategic plan.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives March 10, 2025.
